text: قالوا۟ نعبد اصناما فنظل لها عكفين

translations.translation: They replied: "We worship idols and are devoted to them."
They answered: "There are some idols that we worship and are devoted to them with constancy."
when he asked his father and others, "What do you worship?"
They said, “We worship idols, and we keep squatting in seclusion before them.”
They said: "We worship idols, and to them we are ever devoted."
They said: We worship idols, so we shall be their votaries.
They said, 'We serve idols, and continue cleaving to them.
They said: We worship idols, and are ever devoted unto them.
They said, "We worship idols and will continue to cling to them."
They said: we worship idols, and we are unto them ever devoted
They said, ‘We worship idols, and are constant in our devotion to them.’
They said: "We worship idols, and we remain constantly in attendance on them."
They said: "We worship idols, and to them we are ever devoted."
They replied: 'We worship idols and continue cleaving to them'
They said, “We worship idols, and we remain devoted to them.”
They said, "We worship idols and remain to them devoted."

[26:71]   They said, ‘We worship idols — they reiterate the verb [in the response] in order to supplement it with [the following remark] — and remain cleaving to them’, we remain worshipping them all day; they give a longer response to indicate their [misplaced] pride in such [an act].
(They said: We worship idols) deities, (and are ever devoted unto them) we worship them and remain devoted to their worship.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { قَالُواْ نَعْبُدُ أَصْنَاماً فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَاكِفِينَ } [الشعراء: 71] أي: يدوم عكوفنا إياها وإطاعتنا لها

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
لكنهم أطنبوا فيه بإظهار العامل قصداً إلى إبراز ما في نفوسهم الخبيثة من الابتهاج والافتخار بعبادتها، { فنظلُّ لها عاكفين } أي: فنقيم على عبادتها طول النهار
 وإنما قالوا: { فنظل } لأنهم كانوا يعبدونها بالنهار دون الليل: أو يراد به الدوام
